title: Learn Mentor Gate _ online study application
description: üöÄ Learn Mentor Gate is an online study website. Users can find various types of online courses. They can purchase their favorite courses by paying the course fee. Users can also request to become a teacher by completing a simple survey. If the admin approves the request, they will be considered a teacher on the website. Teachers can add classes from their dashboard, and if approved by the admin, they can also add assignments for specific classes. This website has an admin panel where admins can manage the site, approve classes, make users admins, and remove users, among other tasks.

title: Gadget Shop _ E-commerce application
description: üöÄ Gadget Shop is an E-commerce website. In this website, users can find various types of gadgets and accessories. Users can search for their favorite gadgets, add them to their cart, and checkout after providing delivery information.
